"I'm home.": "Welcome back, Meri. Oh, you brought guests?"
"...Ah! Is that Ilma this time?"
"This is Kukka, my brother."
"Nice to meet you."
"You look surprised. There's five of us in total."
"Five?!"
"Yup, the oldest is Taivas, then Tulli. After that is Ilma, Kukka, and me."
"That's intense..."
"Is it just yourselves who live here?"
"Yes. We lost our parents when we were very young... Grandpa raised us all after that, but..."
"He passed away recently too."
"...Oh... I see."
"Have you heard from Ilma at all?"
"Any information would be of use, regarding his possible whereabouts."
"Ilma's the most distant out of all of us siblings here..."

"Lately he's been holing himself up in his room working on his research.
He'd sometimes vanish to go investigate something or whatever he does..."
"So we didn't think much of it when we noticed he was missing this time..."
"Well, we're here to lend you guys a hand."
"That would be great. More eyes would make the search go much quicker."
"We appreciate the sentiment, but we're not going to burden you."
"This is our family's problem, and we'll figure it out ourselves."
"Taivas and Tulli are out searching right now. So you don't have to worry, they'll handle it."
"They know the Kvaris Region inside and out."
"Besides, you would need someone to help guide you."
"They should be back by sundown, so you should wait right here."
"I'm making dinner tonight. You're welcome to join us."
